author: andreas
msg: added default pub doctype definition to lenya/doctypes directory

author: andreas
msg: added resource type definitions to core

author: imario
msg: When replicating files get rid of reserved and maybe dangerous characters. This allows replication of files like "http://hostname.org/fileservlet?file=abc.txt".

author: andreas
msg: (1) added fallback for doctypes, this means doctypes can be served by the core (1st step towards resource type packages) (2) store workflow state and variable values in meta data. currently the history is stored there as well, this is subject to changes.
